column2: I don't know why I don't have photos of them  but the PORK BELLY HOME FRIES. SO. GOOD. I'm salivating right now just thinking about them.  There are so many choices at Little Goat
column3: I'm always struggling to decide if I want to get the same thing I ordered last time (because I came here craving it) or if I should order something else that sounds equally amazing. Also not pictured
column4: but I'm always coming back craving the Bull's Eye French Toast as well.
